attributes.action: EMA FOR ALL STUDENTS STAYING ON AT COLLEGE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EMA SHOULD BE AVAILABLE FOR ALL STUDENTS WHO WANT TO STAY ON AT COLLEGE TO FURTHER THEIR EDUCATION INSTEAD OF TURNING UP AT THE DOLE OFFICE.  IT IS AN INSULT FOR PARENTS TO BE ASKED ABOUT THEIR EARNINGS, ESPECIALLY WHEN THEY HAVE EARNED THEIR WAGES AND PAID INCOME TAX & NI.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
